# Load Packages

```{r load packages, include=FALSE}

library(dplyr)
library(sf)
library(rgdal)
library(raster)
library(rgeos)
library(gstat)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggspatial)
library(ggnewscale)
library(egg)
library(ggsn)

```


# Figure 4

## Read in Data

```{r fig.4 data}
anvils <- read_sf("Data/ALP_Anvils.GPKG")
```

```{r fig 4 inset}

cols <- c("#A69C94", 
          "#8C2C08")

a <- ggplot(anvils, aes(x = RM_Quality, y = Mean.value , fill = RM_Quality)) + 
  geom_boxplot(show.legend = FALSE) + 
  scale_fill_manual(values = cols)+
  labs(x = "Raw Material Quality",
       y = "Rebound Hardness (RH)")+
  theme(panel.background = element_blank(),
        panel.border = element_rect(fill = NA,
                                    color = "black"))
```
